description: Autonomous research execution plan for Self-Calibrating World Model (SCWM) - a differentiable world model with epistemic uncertainty quantification and online calibration for physical AI. Integrates with cosmos-predict2 for video prediction capabilities.

userStories.title: Literature Survey - World Models for Robotics
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to survey existing world model architectures (DreamerV3, TD-MPC2, IRIS) to identify gaps and position SCWM contributions.
acceptanceCriteria: Search arXiv for papers on world models, model-based RL, uncertainty in planning (2022-2026)
Identify 15-25 relevant papers with citation counts and venues
Create taxonomy: deterministic vs stochastic, latent vs pixel, uncertainty methods
Document key findings from DreamerV3, TD-MPC2, IRIS, World Models (Ha & Schmidhuber)
Identify research gaps: calibration, online adaptation, uncertainty propagation
Generate literature-survey.md with structured findings and citations
Confidence score >= 80% for literature coverage

userStories.title: Technical Deep Dive - Uncertainty Quantification Methods
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to understand state-of-the-art epistemic uncertainty methods for neural networks to select the best approach for SCWM.
acceptanceCriteria: Survey uncertainty quantification methods: Deep Ensembles, MC Dropout, Spectral Normalization, Evidential Networks
Compare computational costs: training time, inference overhead, memory footprint
Analyze calibration quality metrics: ECE, MCE, Brier score, CRPS
Review propagation methods for multi-step predictions (moment matching, sigma points)
Benchmark existing implementations: GPyTorch, Pyro, uncertainty-toolbox
Create comparison matrix in uncertainty-methods.md
Recommend top 2-3 methods for SCWM with justification

userStories.title: Technical Deep Dive - Online Calibration Mechanisms
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to understand online calibration and domain adaptation techniques for continually learning systems.
acceptanceCriteria: Survey online learning methods: EWC, PackNet, Progressive Networks, LoRA adapters
Review calibration techniques: temperature scaling, Platt scaling, isotonic regression
Analyze replay buffer strategies: reservoir sampling, prioritized experience replay
Study domain adaptation: DANN, CORAL, self-supervised adaptation
Review meta-learning approaches: MAML, Reptile, online meta-learning
Document catastrophic forgetting mitigation strategies
Create online-calibration.md with implementation recommendations

userStories.title: Benchmark Analysis - Physical AI Datasets
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to identify benchmark datasets and evaluation protocols for physical AI world models.
acceptanceCriteria: Survey robotics simulation benchmarks: DMControl, Meta-World, Maniskill, RLBench
Review real-world robotics datasets: Bridge, RT-1, Open X-Embodiment
Analyze video prediction benchmarks: Kinetics, Something-Something, RoboNet
Document evaluation metrics: FVD, LPIPS, SSIM for video; success rate for manipulation
Identify physics-based evaluation: contact prediction, collision accuracy
Review existing SOTA results on each benchmark
Create benchmarks-analysis.md with recommended evaluation suite

userStories.title: Architecture Design - SCWM Core Components
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to design the core SCWM architecture integrating world model, uncertainty, and calibration components.
acceptanceCriteria: Design RSSM-based world model with stochastic and deterministic paths
Specify Deep Ensemble integration (N=5 ensemble members)
Design uncertainty propagation through multi-step rollouts
Specify online calibration network architecture (MLP with skip connections)
Design replay buffer with uncertainty-weighted sampling
Document computational requirements and GPU memory estimates
Create architecture-design.md with diagrams and specifications
Ensure differentiability for end-to-end training

userStories.title: Cosmos-Predict2 Integration Analysis
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to analyze how SCWM can integrate with NVIDIA's Cosmos-Predict2 for video prediction capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Review Cosmos-Predict2 architecture: DiT-based video generation, tokenizers, conditioners
Identify integration points: latent space, conditioning mechanisms, action inputs
Analyze Video2World pipeline for action-conditioned generation
Document checkpoint compatibility and fine-tuning requirements
Design adapter layer between SCWM uncertainty estimates and Cosmos conditioning
Estimate compute requirements for joint training/inference
Create cosmos-integration.md with technical specifications
Identify potential contribution back to Cosmos codebase

userStories.title: Isaac Lab Integration Analysis
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to analyze how SCWM can integrate with NVIDIA Isaac Lab for robotics simulation.
acceptanceCriteria: Review Isaac Lab architecture: environments, sensors, actuators, RL training
Identify integration points: observation/action spaces, reward functions, reset conditions
Analyze existing world model integrations in Isaac Lab ecosystem
Design SCWM as a learnable dynamics model within Isaac Lab training loop
Document uncertainty-aware planning interface
Estimate simulation-to-real transfer considerations
Create isaac-integration.md with implementation roadmap

userStories.title: Experimental Design - Ablation Studies
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to design comprehensive ablation studies to validate each SCWM component's contribution.
acceptanceCriteria: Design ablation: ensemble size (1, 3, 5, 7 members)
Design ablation: uncertainty propagation methods (naive, moment matching, sigma points)
Design ablation: calibration frequency (every step, every episode, every N steps)
Design ablation: replay buffer size and sampling strategies
Define evaluation metrics for each ablation
Estimate compute budget for full ablation study
Create experimental-design.md with detailed protocols
Define statistical significance tests (paired t-test, bootstrap CI)

userStories.title: Implementation Plan - Core SCWM Module
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want a detailed implementation plan for the core SCWM Python module.
acceptanceCriteria: Define module structure: scwm/core/{world_model, uncertainty, calibration}
Specify class interfaces: WorldModel, EpistemicUncertaintyEstimator, OnlineCalibrator
Document dependencies: PyTorch, einops, hydra-core
Create unit test specifications for each component
Define integration test scenarios
Estimate lines of code and development time
Create implementation-plan.md with week-by-week milestones
Define code review and testing checkpoints

userStories.title: Competitive Analysis - Related Systems
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to analyze competing/related systems to position SCWM's unique contributions.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze NVIDIA Cosmos-Reason1 for prompt refinement integration
Review Genesis World (if available) and similar foundation models
Compare with commercial offerings: Wayve GAIA, Tesla FSD world models
Analyze Google DeepMind's Genie and Genie 2 for generative world models
Document UniSim and other unified simulation approaches
Create competitive landscape matrix
Identify SCWM's unique value proposition: calibration + uncertainty + integration
Create competitive-analysis.md with positioning recommendations

userStories.title: Publication Strategy - Paper Outline
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want to create a publication strategy and paper outline for SCWM.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify target venues: ICRA, CoRL, RSS, NeurIPS (robotics track)
Create paper outline following venue format
Draft abstract (150-200 words)
Outline key contributions (3-4 main points)
Plan figure/diagram needs
Define related work positioning
Estimate timeline to submission
Create publication-strategy.md with detailed outline

userStories.title: Research Synthesis - Final Report
userStories.description: As a researcher, I want a comprehensive synthesis of all research findings into a final report.
acceptanceCriteria: Synthesize all research outputs into cohesive narrative
Identify confirmed hypotheses and unexpected findings
Document open questions and future work
Create executive summary for stakeholders
Compile all citations and references
Generate final confidence scores for each research area
Create scwm-research-report.md as comprehensive deliverable
Include risk assessment and mitigation strategies

customPrompts.physicalAI: Focus on physical AI applications including robotics, simulation, and embodied agents. Prioritize sources from ICRA, CoRL, RSS, and NeurIPS robotics workshops.
